title: Positive point charge near bar magnet

content.prompt: A positive point charge is initially at rest close to a bar magnet that is also at rest. The charge will

choices.label: be attracted to the north pole of the magnet
be repelled by the north pole of the magnet
be attracted to the south pole of the magnet
be repelled by the south pole of the magnet

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
